title: Eigenvalue estimates for Schrödinger operators on metric trees
abstract: We consider Schrödinger operators on radial metric trees and prove Lieb–Thirring and Cwikel–Lieb–Rozenblum inequalities for their negative eigenvalues. The validity of these inequalities depends on the volume growth of the tree. We show that the bounds are valid in the endpoint case and reflect the correct order in the weak or strong coupling limit.
